alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:11AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1010 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong showers along a line extending from Glenvar Heights to 6 miles west of Ocean Reef. Movement was northwest at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Homestead, Coral Gables, South Miami, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Turkey Point, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Florida City, West Miami, Westchester, Naranja, Glenvar Heights, Palmetto Bay, University Of Miami and Zoo Miami. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the strong showers passes.
